channel.title: 1m rs cash reward for whoever helps me fix problem!
channel.description:
it lets me run my server... okay
but it only lets me log in i am pretty sure i set ports right, i am not using a router so i dont have to forward the port...
the only way to log into it is on my computer using the ip 0.0.0.0... how do i make it to where other people can log into my server
no joke if u fix this problem 1m$$ rs cash reward.

item.title: 1m rs cash reward for whoever helps me fix problem!
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

Ohh… I see… Ok, qwerty is saying that if you go into Control Panel->Windows Firewall->Exceptions Tab->Add Port->Then just type for port name Port 43594 and for port number put 43594. And so all I need to do (I have a laptop, no router) for my server, is get a no-ip connected to my IP address found at whatismyip.org and open up the port?

Read full topic

item.title: 1m rs cash reward for whoever helps me fix problem!
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

[quote=“b-rice, post:1, topic:140298”]it lets me run my server… okay

but it only lets me log in i am pretty sure i set ports right, i am not using a router so i dont have to forward the port…

the only way to log into it is on my computer using the ip 0.0.0.0… how do i make it to where other people can log into my server

no joke if u fix this problem 1m$$ rs cash reward.[/quote]
First, download hamachi here at http://hamachi.cc, then, once its installed and everything, click the triangle button and select create new network and put in what you want the network name and pass to be.

Example
Network Name:BlahScape
Password:123 (you should probably go with 123, everyone else does because its easy to remember)

Then, once you have your network, you can tell people to join your network, but make sure to spell the network name correctly. (If it was typed BlahScape when created, you should tell them that exactly, not tell them just blahscape…)
And give them your password to the network… And once some people have joined and the server is up, tell them to put your hamachi IP for server IP. (Your hamachi IP can be found at the top of the hamachi screen it should look like 5.123.456.78) Hope I helped, and if it worked, PM me here and tell me I helped and where to meet you on RS for my payment.

Read full topic
item.source: 1m rs cash reward for whoever helps me fix problem!

item.title: 1m rs cash reward for whoever helps me fix problem!
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

go to whatismyip.org

type in the text that appears there into the address bar.

Click “virtual servers”

make a new server. set the protocol to “TCPUDP” or “BOTH” and for the ip type your IP. name it “somethingscape”

The IP from whatismyip.org is what people use to login

Read full topic
